description:
Uphold your pact with the Titan of Death, Epimetheus!
Fight, climb and solve your way through a twisted tower as three unique adventurers,
on a mission to save their village from impending doom!

v0.14.0.description:
- Upgrade AP MultiClient to v6 for better 0.5.0 support
- Fix more campfire warp edge cases
- Add `allow_block_warping` option to allow Zeek to carry a block through a campfire warp
- More logic fixes

More Information: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
Setup Guide: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md

v0.21.0.description:
- UT now works without a yaml
- Fix rocks trap breaking the final boss elevator
- Fix shop rando leaking into other saves
- Bram is now allowed uppies

This mod version not at all compatible with seeds generated on earlier versions.

- Fix character shop item icons

This mod version is not compatible with seeds generated on versions earlier than v0.21.0.

v0.22.0.description:
- Complete logic rewrite to support current and future features
- A new Astalon Tracker in the AP launcher that integrates with UT if installed
- A `/route` command in the new tracker that will tell you the shortest route and required logic to the given location or region
- More logic fixes
- Added a couple community submitted cutscene traps

More Information: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
Setup Guide: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.22.0.title: v0.22.0

v0.23.0.description:
**NOTE**: I've restructured the mod a little bit in this. When updating you must remove the old mod version by deleting everything in `Astalon/BepInEx/plugins` before installing this new one. The screenshots in the setup guide have been updated so you can verify if things are correct.

- Update Archipelago.MultiClient.Net to 6.6.0 to fix compatibility with AP 0.6.0 hints
- Fix some unrandomized white key logic
- Speed up gen times and lower memory usage a bit
- Restructure mod to make it a little more clear

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0
**More Information**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
**Setup Guide**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.23.0.title: v0.23.0

v0.23.1.description:
- Fix map tab auto tracking on latest version of UT (thanks Faris)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.23.0...v0.23.1
**More Information**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
**Setup Guide**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.23.1.title: v0.23.1

v0.24.0.description:
- Fully compatible with both AP 0.6.1 and 0.6.2-rc
- Support for all new Universal Tracker features (0.6.2 only)
  - Your location on the map is shown with the current character you're playing as
  - Hard logic accessible locations show up as yellow on both the tracker list and map when playing on easy
- Adds TagLink, blame DK64
- Zeek's room cutscenes should have fewer problems now
- Route command is now disabled in race mode
- More logic fixes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.23.1...v0.24.0
**More Information**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
**Setup Guide**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.24.0.title: v0.24.0

v0.25.0.description:
- Add support for the improved `/get_logical_path` command in UT
  - This works the same as the old `/route` command but you no longer need to use the special Astalon Tracker
- Add option groups
- Some deathlink fixes
- More logic fixes

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.24.1...v0.25.0
**More Information**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
**Setup Guide**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.25.0.title: v0.25.0

v0.26.0.description:
- Visited campfires now sync to datastorage
  - This means playing the same slot in coop or starting a new file will remember the campfires you've visited and make them available for warps
- `/get_logical_path` now includes campfire warps as shortcuts
- Update Archipelago.MultiClient.Net to 6.7.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.25.0...v0.26.0
**More Information**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/en_Astalon.md
**Setup Guide**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago/blob/astalon/worlds/astalon/docs/setup_en.md
v0.26.0.title: v0.26.0

v0.27.0.description:
- Clicking on the slot name on the room page now lets you directly open Astalon or Universal Tracker and automatically connect
- Fix /next_progression UT command
- More logic fix

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/drtchops/Archipelago-Astalon/compare/v0.26.0...v0.27.0
